name: Main Path
description:
Main Path Game

"Main path" was developed in two days for Ferdowsi University of Mashhad October 2020 GAMEJAM. This is my first little game.

This  game is a demo for the my Main project, and it will be much bigger, with much better graphics, wider gameplay and a richer story, and wait for a great adventure.

follow me on social media to stay up to date with the main game development news.

If you enjoyed the game, Donate for helping me in making better games.

( Share your final scores with #MainPathGame on social )
